original_title: S. Thomas’ win the toss, opt to field
original_body_lines: S. Thomas' College captain Romesh Mendis won the toss and opted to field in the 144th Royal-Thomian encounter that began at the SSC Grounds a short while ago.

Royal XI: Rehan Pieris, Sineth Jayawardena, Ovina Ambanpola, Uvindu Weerasekera, Dasis Manchanayake (Captain), Ramiru Perera, Sanvidu Seneratharachchi, Sandesh Ramanayake, Nethwin Dharmarathne, Ranuka Malaviarachchi, Bulan Weeratunga

S. Thomas' College XI: Thisen Eheliyagoda, Senadhi Bulankulama, Romesh Mendis (Captain), Dineth Goonewardena, Mahith Perera, Senesh Hettiarachchi, Nathan Caldera, Charuka Peiris, Akash Fernando, Kavindu Dias, Abheeth Paranawidana
